name: Vecho Fights (Jack Bandai)
description:
VECHO FIGHTS

  Vecho Fights is a 2D side scroll one on one fighting game that has two characters duel in a best two out of three matches. Game play mechanism is focused on players creating deadly combos using any of the nine characters by chaining or combining their different attacks such as special attacks,boosters,juggle or ordinary attacks(punches or kicks).

STORY

        In the year 20XX the world had been terrorized by an evil terrorist organization called The Night Dragons.Their leader Master Code had brought havoc and chaos upon millions of lives on earth.This got the attention of the World Nations League(W.N.L),concerned and afraid of such an organisation they called upon the world's top S-rank army the V-corps.Captain Jimm was ordered to bring down this organization once and for all.A secret operation was set to take out The Night Dragons.Master Code decided to take action before the V-corps did after receiving intel from a ghost V-corp agent who had been selling them out.With this advantage Master Code sent out an elite of  his most deadliest assassins to take out the V-corps.The ambush left the V-corps headquarters in a bloodshed with only a few surviving among them was Captain Jimm. Now with the world's top S-rank army devastated Master Code can finally unleash ultimate mayhem upon the earth using a top secret weapon. Angry at the loss of his comrades Captain Jimm has vowed to end Master Code and the Night Dragons organization even if it means its the last thing he will ever do. This is Vecho Fights...

FEATURES

The game is still in early development most of the content is still missing such as characters,arenas,arcade mode,training mode,tutorial mode,art zone etc. These will be added with time as updates. Currently these are some of the game features include:

-Three playable characters

-Two arenas or locations

-Battle mode which can played either as player one vs computer or player one vs player two.

-Each character is equipped with a two punch attacks,two kick attacks,a throw/grab,three special attacks,an extra ability/attack called booster, a counter tech called logic counter and a super attack called vecho finisher.

-Amazing two dimensional vector art sprites or art.

-Juggle system that can chain any attack into a combo

-Cinematic super/ultimate attacks(Vecho Finisher)

-A traffic system that helps you determine an opponent's state such as if they are invincible or blocking based on certain colors.

UPCOMING CONTENT

-Seven extra unique characters 

-Five battle arenas or locations with background characters and objects.

-Arcade mode plus other modes such as training mode,tutorial mode and a survival mode called street king tournament.

-A gallery or art section called art zone.

-Character voices,in game sound effects and extra music to be added.

-Extra costumes for all 10 characters.

REQUIREMENTS

Minimum specs

-Windows 7 or 8 or 10(Windows 32bit or 64bit) ,2.5 GHZ processor, 4GB ram(memory), intel(R) core(TM) 2 Duo, with or without a graphic card. 

Recommended specs

-Windows 7 or 8 or 10(Windows 32bit or 64bit) ,2.8 GHZ processor ,6GB ram(memory),intel or Nvidia ,with or without a graphic card.

HOW TO PLAY

     Use the yellow mouse to select a mode in the main menu and other options such as difficulty setting,changing a page or dialogue.You can find information about the default controls and how the game works in the 'HOW TO PLAY' option and character's movelists in the 'COMMAND LISTS' option on the main menu screen. If controls are not responding click on the game screen to focus in.
